document.full_text: japan's parliament on monday passed a $50 billion emergency budget for disaster relief after the march 11 earthquake and tsunami, a downpayment on what is set to be country's biggest public works effort in six decades.
document.title: japan passes quake relief budget, more spending to follow
lines_and_colors: japan's parliament on monday passed a $50 billion emergency budget for disaster relief after the march 11 earthquake and tsunami, a downpayment on what is set to be country's biggest public works effort in six decades.
